events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request due to customer's mention of receiving the wrong item.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order discrepancy.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 45378921, and I have attached a photo showing the item I received does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the prompt response and helpful solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and quick refund process.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return shipping label was emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you received your refund and the return process went smoothly. If you have any other concerns, feel free to reach out.
Since your refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to you by email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
